releaseNotes: In the effort to entertain the planet, we provide you regular software updates focusing on dropping into new product features, enhancements and bug fixes. This update in addition to the bug improvements includes continued enhancement to the video player and loading experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates & out of this world features coming very soon!
description:
Pluto TV is your free streaming app to watch free full movies and TV shows anywhere, on any device. Get ready to binge any time you want with:
* 100s+ of live TV channels
* 1000s of free movies and TV shows
* 24/7 entertainment

Stream now. Pay never.

Watch Live TV with criminally-good True Crime shows, featuring channels curated by real humans! Stream popular movies, sports, and more on Pluto TV.

Watch classic TV shows and movies from a wide range of genres. Whatever you choose, Pluto TV is available on any device, anywhere, so you can watch from the comfort of your own home or when you are on the move. Explore a variety of movie and TV genres, including:

* Action/Adventure - “The Last Legion”, “The Last Witch Hunter” & “Redemption”
* Paranormal/Horror -“SAW”, “An American Werewolf In London”, & “The Grudge”
* Real Life Adventure - “Dog The Bounty Hunter”
* True Crime - “Runaway Jury,”
* Reality TV - “Catfish” 
* Entertainment - “Hell’s Kitchen”
* Comedy - "Big Mommas House”

Download Pluto TV for endless streaming entertainment options with new movies and shows or series added constantly. Discover a better way to live stream movies and TV free.

Check back often so you don’t miss the new movies and TV shows we add to our library every day.

PLUTO TV OPTIONS

STREAM LIVE SPORTS, NEWS, SUMMER SPECIALS & MORE
- Watch live sports including basketball, football, baseball and classic games
- Dive into live channels, movies, shows and romantic comedy specials
- Stream breaking news, opinion and stats

WATCH MOVIES ANYWHERE
- Watch movies for free from a wide range of action to comedy and sci-fi!     
- Stream movies free with everything from action films to sci-fi and romance flicks

NEWS, DOCUMENTARIES AND MUCH MORE!
- Stream breaking news
- Dive into documentaries, from animals to science and history
- Watch binge-worthy entertainment from talk shows to game shows
                                    
WATCH TV YOUR WAY
- Watch your favourite TV shows with 100s live channels
- Stream TV with free shows and series such as CSI, MacGyver, Count Duckula, and much more
- Watch TV seasons of popular hits like Hell’s Kitchen, A-Team and Teen Mom

Watch free movies and live TV shows everywhere, 100% free and legal. Download the Pluto TV app today!
